attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: iam deeply hurt that the redarrows may be terminated they are the best display team in the world the skys would be very dull with out them, they bring so much joy to adults and children most people go to airshows just to see them i believe the queen would be very sad to see them go as i see them as her display team so iam begging you to reconsider this frightful possablity thankyou. anyone reading this please sign the petition keep the red arrows in the air they are simple the best and would be hard to replace airshows will never be the same again without them in fact i think i would cry.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
